short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Takipcimx followers extension can manage your Instagram 1000 followers and helps to find mutual followers and etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can manage your Instagram followers with features like finding mutual followers, following back, and unfollowing non-followers.

For all of your Instagram networking needs, "Takipcimx Followers Tool" is the app to use. Whether you're an Instagram beginner, an aspiring personal brand manager, or an established business, you'll find it easy to use.  

Features of takipcimx followers extension:

* Check out who hasn't followed you back: Just click to start cleaning up your following list.
* Identify your Mutual friends - Recognize your connections with people on both ends.
* Look up quickly - You can easily look for usernames or names in your lists of followers and follows.
* Control your followers - Refollow those that follow you back, unfollow those you don't want to reconnect with.

How to use the extension?

1. First of all, You must login to your Instagram account on your chrome browser.
2. Now click on the extension then click and use the above mentioned featres easily.

*Important*
Keep in mind that you'll need to make your Instagram account public before you can use this tool.

Thank you for using this extension.
